name: No, I'm Invisible!
description:
I present to you: Hide And Seek - The Video Game

Find the best hiding spot while "it" counts to zero. When anyone of your friends is found they proceed to help "it" find you. 

There's a twist - the closer you stay to "it" the better is your score. How many points can you get by hiding right behind "its" back?

The game was made in 72h (1.5 day really) for Mini Jam 55. 

Jam's theme and limitation: stealth, no violence
